Literature.Title: Antimicrobial peptides expressed in medicinal maggots of the blow fly Lucilia sericata show combinatorial activity against bacteria.
Literature.Author: Pöppel AK, Vogel H, Wiesner J, Vilcinskas A

Literature.Title: The Drosophila melanogaster antimicrobial peptides Mtk-1 and Mtk-2 are active against the malarial parasite Plasmodium falciparum.
Literature.Author: Tonk M, Pierrot C, Cabezas-Cruz A, Rahnamaeian M, Khalife J, Vilcinskas A

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Mouse erythrocytes:<10% Hemolysis=100 µM,Pig erythrocytes:<10% Hemolysis=100 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli D31(MIC=6.2µM),Micrococcus luteus DSM 20030(MIC=37.5µM),Enterococcus faecalis 1528(no activity data),Staphylococcus aureus 511(no activity data),Staphylococcus aureus 134/39(no activity data),Mycobacterium smegmatis 987(no activity data),Penicillium chrysogenum JP36(no activity data),Candida albicans(no activity data),Plasmodium falciparum 3D7(40-50% Inhibition=50µM)
